name: logos-search
title: Logos Search
description: Opens books, verses or resources in Logos Bible Software
author: michael_marvive

commands.name: open-verse
commands.title: Open Verse in Logos
commands.subtitle: Open a Bible verse in Logos
commands.description: Open a Bible reference in Logos Bible Software using version aliases

preferences.name: defaultVersion
preferences.title: Default Version
preferences.description: The Bible version to use when no alias prefix is provided.

preferences.name: versionAliases
preferences.title: Version Aliases
preferences.description: JSON object or alias=version pairs for quick version shortcuts.

preferences.name: openMethod
preferences.title: Open Method
preferences.description: Choose how Raycast opens the verse in Logos.

preferences.name: copyUrlToClipboard
preferences.title: Copy final URL to clipboard
preferences.label: Copy final URL to clipboard
preferences.description: Copies the computed URL to the clipboard for troubleshooting.

commands.name: search-library
commands.title: Search Library
commands.subtitle: Find and open a Logos resource
commands.description: Search your Logos library by title or author and open a resource

preferences.name: catalogPath
preferences.title: Catalog DB Path Override
preferences.description: Optional path to catalog.db. Leave empty for auto-discovery.

preferences.name: openScheme
preferences.title: Open Scheme
preferences.description: Choose the first URL scheme to try when opening a resource.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
